2/x And, as Norm knows well:

Filling vacancies is not “packing the Court.”

The Senate’s Advice & Consent (confirming or not confirming individual nominees) is not “packing the Court.”

What FDR tried & Biden plans to do—expanding the number of Justices—IS “packing the Court.”

It’s a shame to see AEI scholar regurgitating left-wing talking points that are demonstrably false.

The GOP had both Houses of Congress in 2017. We COULD have tried to pack the Court if we wanted to. But we DIDN’T—nobody even suggested it—because it would destroy the judiciary. https://twitter.com/NormOrnstein/status/1318237412376645638 QT @NormOrnstein A little thought exercise: Obama fills the Scalia vacancy.
